Name: 1000 Friends of Wisconsin
Description: Advocate and promote uses of land, air, and water that shape healthy communities.
Interests: Transportation policy and funding, comprehensive planning, land use, water quality regulations, stewardship, DNR budget.

(FE)

Name: 211 Wisconsin, Inc.
Description: Local information and referral centers, community organizations and statewide programs.
Interests: Issues affecting the quality and capacity to deliver information and referral services throughout the state. These may include but are not limited to matters affecting funding, and regulation of services.

Name: 3M
Description: Traffic control and materials. General corporate and business issues.
Interests: Matters relating to transportation, law enforcement, safety, registration issues, registration plates, commerce, business, health, environment and taxation.

Name: 9to5
Description: 9to5's membership is comprised of directly affected women and allies of our work. Our financial support includes private foundations and earned income strategies.
Interests: A core component of 9to5's work is related to work/family - protecting and expanding family leave. It is within this frame that we anticipate influencing policy during the legislative session.

Name: AAA Wisconsin
Description: Users of Wisconsin roads, highways and interstates, including drivers and passengers
Interests: Automobile transportation and travel-related matters, with attendant environmental quality and safety standards. Matters related to the safety, financing, environmental influence and insurance of automobile transportation and other forms of travel.
